评论详情: Good quality.  Would recommend going up a size because waist seems small. Other than that , they are very comfortable
Came fast, right size, looked good. But not a 5 star bec it didnt look exactly like it but it kinda did, so buy it
Falling apart at the seems (multiple) upon first time wearing them.  I'd rate them zero stars if I could.

They are super comfortable and look great. I would recommend sizing down as they are fairly long and the waist is stretchy so it doesn't matter to much. None of the seams have ripped and it overall fits nicely and is very gentle on skin.
My daughter wore them 1 time and they ripped while she was in school from the just above the knee, down.
Just as pictured, loose, baggy, relaxed fit. very confortable.

Daughter wanted these. Got them and immediately was disappointed. My daughter wears them,but as a parent I seen exactly what they were. Just Bed Pants with a higher price tag. These were just like the bed pants I bought from another store for $7. The pockets tore out with in a month. Over all fit was perfect, but the price is rather high. Rest of the material seems to be holding up well. Price and pocket stitching coming undone is enough for me to say look elsewhere.
They are super cute but they fell apart after wearing them a few times.
Thin fabric tore easily when going to sit down.
Not made well and cheap material.
These have held up well tomorrow teen daughter wearing them constantly.  Good buy

Cute pants bought as a gift. Fit as expected but the material is thin. May want to check and be sure you can’t see through them before you wear them out. Update 1/4/23 daughter has worn these a handful of times since receiving them for Christmas and the seam down the side of the pants is splitting. Do not recommend these, they have split numerous times. Unless you want to constantly repair them do not buy these!
